comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Played for the Tip Tops, then for the New York Giants for the next 5 seasons. Nickname: "Ty Cobb of the Federal League", stole 55 bases in 1915. www.baseball-almanac.com/players/player.php?p=kauffbe01

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Artolog: thanks for the additional information.  We may update the record.
